mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_cd, user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_tel, user_email) values(#{user_id}, 1, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_tel}, #{user_email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT user_id, user_cd, user_name, user_tel FROM user where user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = #{user_pw}
update user set user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_tel=#{user_tel}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_auth=#{user_auth} where user_num = #{user_num}
